enhanced_description: Allianz Technology, headquartered in Unterföhring, Bavaria, and launched in 2010, serves as Allianz's global IT service provider. With over 13,000 employees operating in more than 20 countries, it is tasked with leading the digital transformation of the financial services industry. The company runs, optimizes, transforms, and innovates the IT infrastructure, applications, and services in collaboration with Allianz companies to co-create the best customer experience. Its core offerings include managing transitional applications and decommissioning legacy systems, providing solutions for finance, actuarial, investment, procurement, and reporting functions, and leveraging Business Intelligence, Big Data, and AI. Additionally, Allianz Technology drives the Allianz Cloud Journey through Hybrid Cloud Services, ensures end-to-end Information Security operations, and brings tangible business value using emerging technologies like Blockchain. A key business objective for Allianz Technology is to improve employee happiness and engagement within the Allianz Group.
